Customizing the generated manifest

The way in which facsimile images are referenced from a TEI document will differ between projects. We nevertheless tried to keep the code as generic as possible, but there are a few settings which may need adjustment.

All settings concerning IIIF manifest generation can be found in modules/iiif-config.xqm. In particular, you may want to change the following variables/functions:

$iiifc:IMAGE_API_BASE

The base URI of the IIIF image service to use for displaying images

iiifc:milestones

Should return the TEI elements in the document context which reference an image. Usually those are pb or milestone elements, but other variations are possible.

iiifc:milestone-id

For each element returned by iiifc:milestones, extract the path to the image. By default this tries to read the image path from the @facs attribute.
